_aChangeLog.text: Rebuld of all cubemaps for increasing the quality of the graphics.

_aLatestUpdates._sText:
Now the graphics looks better, because I did rebuild of all cubemaps for both maps (of old & latest version of „CS Source”).
I also edited navigation paths of bots, that to be more interesting to play with them (on both maps!).
Plus little bugs were fixed.
And the map for old version now was compiled with HDR effect (special HDR, specific only for old versions, like v.34 & v.45).
Press on "Manual Download" and just download the archive. You can unzip over the previous files (see Installation Instructions). :)

_aChangeLog.text: A lot of bugs fixed, improved the optimization. added some objects, also new sounds for ambient.

_aLatestUpdates._sText:
A lot of bugs were fixed! Was improved the optimization.
Also added some sounds for ambient.
Some objects were added for background and not only.
I hope for you will be more exciting to play. :)
Have a good hunting! :)

_sText:
- Hi! :) I present to you my new map “cs_overwatch” for "Counter-Strike: Source".
I am game developer, but sometimes I do level design for some existing games, to gather experience or to keep fit.
This map is called “cs_overwatch” (with a mission of hostage rescue) and is created on the basis of map from “Half-Life 2 Deathmatch” – just I have taken a level with almost empty walls and removed the nonworking elements and made a playable level for "Counter-Strike: Source".
So here is everything you need to play, plus I also added a tactical places for snipers or for a sudden attack, plus some "landmarks" and even a map for radar.
Changes and enhancements are really a lot, also the map is better optimized.
I hope will be exciting to play. :)
Have a good hunting! :)
---------------------------------
A kind of review of my map here:

For download this map just click below on "Manual Download".
